law.catch_line: Pledging or hypothecation of licenses prohibited.
law.text: No person shall pledge or hypothecate any license issued under KRS 243.020 to 243.670. Any such pledge or hypothecation and any contract providing therefor shall be void.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2554b-161.
